document.full_text: police in sierra leone said on wednesday they had seized three tons of marijuana with an estimated street value of some $10 million, one of the biggest seizures in recent years in the fragile west african nation.
document.title: sierra leone police seize 3 tons of marijuana
lines_and_colors: police in sierra leone said on wednesday they had seized three tons of marijuana with an estimated street value of some $10 million, one of the biggest seizures in recent years in the fragile west african nation.
